tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pill_dispenser (
    dispenser_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    dispenser_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_refill_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    last_used_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medication (
  medication_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage FLOAT,
  frequency INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (medication_id)
)

CREATE TABLE pill_dispensers (
  dispenser_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  last_dispensed TIMESTAMP,
  quantity_left INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (dispenser_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medication_records (
	record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	medication_id INT,
	dispenser_id INT,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (dispenser_id) REFERENCES pill_dispensers(dispenser_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medication_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_id INT NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  dispenser_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
